title: Yewon Kang
text:
I’m a PhD student in Educational Psychology at the University of Minnesota.
I’m interested in reading in online and digital contexts. I’m currently studying how AI can support building knowledge and improving comprehension. I work in the Reading + Learning Lab, advised by Dr. Panayiota Kendeou.
I’m also the Instructional Technology Fellow for the School of Social Work, where I assist instructors with educational technology tools, enhance accessibility, and help build effective course sites.




Digital reading comprehension

AI-supported questioning and self-explanation

Online inquiry and evaluation

Learning from science texts









PhD Student, Educational Psychology


University of Minnesota







M.A., Educational Psychology


Yonsei University
